Name: Yo Ho
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring bitter lemon tonic.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet and relatively low in alcohol, a refreshing lemony drink for a lazy summer afternoon.
Nutrition: One serving of Yo Ho contains 121 calories
